articles.title: Firerose Says the 'Truth Is Coming to Light' About Her Ex-Husband Billy Ray Cyrus: 'It's Very Sad' - AOL
articles.description: The Australian singer issued a statement two days after Billy Ray's son, Trace Cyrus, wrote an emotional open letter asking his father to get help
articles.content:
Firerose is speaking out following her ex-husband Billy Ray Cyrus' inauguration performance controversy.

articles.title: Novak Djokovic vows to strive for more Grand Slam titles at age 37 after his latest injury - The Associated Press
articles.description: Novak Djokovic is 37 and was forced to stop playing because of an injury at two of the past four Grand Slam tournaments. That includes quitting after just one set in the Australian Open semifinals on Friday because of a problem with his left leg. Djokovic sai…
